thread.title: Great Stay
thread.title_full: Great Stay - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Paula B
title: Great Stay
text:
The hotel is dated, as are many in NYC, but clean and comfortable. The location was great. Room was large, lots of lighting, and it was nice to have a small kitchen area. Bathroom was small but clean. All the staff was efficient and friendly and quickly attended to our needs. The price was very fair as we did get a deal online for booking in advance, but still had a week prior to cancel if something came up. We would definitely stay here again if the price was right.
